editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project “The Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab:
kha cig mngo+ons brgyad du bas bye bar de'i don ci ston
pa dang phye nas ston pa zer ro ||
phyin pa la zhes par rnog lo ts+tsha bas btags pa ba dang dngos kyi shes rab kyi yphol tu phyin pa mtha' dag bzungso zheso ||
khyung rin chen grags ltar na mkhyen 3 spyi yin la | sbyor 4 dang chosku bye brag yin pas | spyis bye brag bsdus gsung ngo ||
gser gling pa rigs nges par 'dod pa dang | ma nges par 'dod pi dbang du byas nas phyi ma yin te |

'dul dkar na re degi mtshid zhi bi rnaM pa zhes pa ni byede'i dmig pa rtogs pa yino zhes lo tsha ba zang rngog 2
gsung ba mi legs kyi 'gyur yang sngon gyi 'brom dang 'buM pas 'thun par byas pi stong pi mtshid kyis bdag med pa dang de'i mtshid kyis zhi bi rnaM pa 4 dug dang zhes pa de legs te |

'jaM gsar na re | ma tas zhi ba bsdun
bden gyi 4'i thu+ong gi rnaMr 'dod pa mi tig te | 'gyur yang sngon gyi swo 'dul dkar dang don 'thun par byaso ||

gzhon nu dpal na re mos pa pa 2 pa 3 pa 4 pa dang | bsngo ba ya lnga pa drug pa bdun pa dang rjesu yi rang
pa brgyad pa dgu pa dang | bsgrub pa dang rnaM dag sgoM laM sa bcu pas bsdus zhes 'chad do ||

khyung po grags se na re gzhung ji lta med ltar ni mi rigso zhes tshig sbyar te de 2 ltar na yang spang
gnyen dod mnyaM por rigso zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'i don yin shes zero zheso ||
smon lam 'od zer na re 'phags pa ltar na sbyor ba 'di dag 'du 'dus ste |

gnyal pa na re phung po lnga ma rdzogs pa ni byis pa phung pa lnga'o ||
sdod pa ni rgan po'i 'ther zhen kun brtong spgo la 'chad pa mi 'thaed paos tsaM gyi lhyad 'chad pa ma yin pas zer ba
ar na re 'grel pa 2 po'i dgongs pa 'bre'i ltar gsal zer ro ||
dpal zha lu'i gtsug lag khang du rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal gyis{°} gyis sdebs pa'o || dge'o | bkrashis
